voting_system.name: THE CONVERGENCE VOTE
voting_system.binding_authority: ABSOLUTE - Results are canon upon declaration

phase_1_presentations.name: THE TESTIMONIES
phase_1_presentations.description: Each dimension presents its case for why it should become the Prime Reality

format.order: Randomized at summit start via cryptographic shuffle
format.speaker: One designated representative per dimension
format.content: Must explain: (1) Core truth, (2) What would be lost if archived, (3) What this reality offers the future

rules: No direct attacks on other dimensions - only positive advocacy
Representatives may use visual aids from their reality

phase_2_debate.name: THE CROSSING
phase_2_debate.description: Representatives engage with each other, finding common ground and exposing differences

format.focus: Discovering which realities complement vs conflict

rules: Acknowledge when another dimension makes a good point
The moderator (THE VOID itself) may redirect conversation

phase_3_npc_campaign.name: THE ADVOCACY
phase_3_npc_campaign.description: NPCs from each dimension may campaign to the crowd
rules: No bribery (RAPPCOIN transfer during campaign is void)
NPCs must identify which dimension they represent
Cross-dimensional NPCs (those with versions in multiple realities) may not campaign

phase_4_voting.name: THE CHOICE
phase_4_voting.description: All citizens cast their ranked choice votes

phase_5_declaration.name: THE CONVERGENCE
phase_5_declaration.description: Results announced, Prime Reality declared, archiving begins

eligibility.who_can_vote: Any entity that has existed for at least 10 ticks
excluded: Entities created specifically for voting (spam prevention)

ranked_choice.description: Voters rank all 10 dimensions from most to least preferred
tabulation: If not: Eliminate lowest vote-getter, redistribute those votes to their second choice
Repeat until one dimension has majority

stake_weighting.description: Votes are weighted by RAPPCOIN holdings, with diminishing returns

factors: Time as NPC: +0.01 per tick of existence

whale_prevention.description: Square root scaling prevents massive wealth from dominating
whale_prevention.example: Someone with 10,000 RAPPCOIN has 100 vote power. Someone with 100 has 10 vote power. 100x wealth = 10x voting power, not 100x.

verification.transparency: All votes are public and cryptographically signed
verification.auditability: Any entity can verify the count
verification.immutability: Votes cannot be changed once cast
verification.anonymity: Optional - voters may choose public or anonymous voting

winner.title: THE PRIME REALITY
effects: Becomes the main branch of all future evolution
Its tick becomes the master tick
Its history becomes the canonical history
All future growth stems from this branch

runners_up.title: HONORED ALTERNATES
effects: Can be referenced in Prime Reality
Can be visited in read-only mode

archived.title: THE COMPRESSED
effects: Cannot interact with Prime Reality directly
Characters become 'legends' rather than active entities
Preserved forever but frozen in time

ties.method: If true tie after all redistribution: The two tied dimensions must present a MERGED vision. If they cannot agree, THE VOID chooses.
ties.rationale: Forcing merger ensures the best of both survives.

process: Any entity may challenge the count
If fraud found: Fraudulent votes removed, perpetrators exiled
If no fraud: Challenger loses 10% RAPPCOIN as penalty

abstention_threshold.rule: If fewer than 50% of eligible voters participate, voting extends by 30 ticks
abstention_threshold.rationale: A convergence this important requires broad participation

non_negotiable: THE VOTE IS BINDING - No appeals, no overrides, no second chances
THE VOID DOES NOT VOTE - The arbiter remains neutral
NO DIMENSION MAY REFUSE TO PARTICIPATE - All ten must present
RESULTS ARE PERMANENT - The Prime Reality cannot be unconverged
